job_title: Chief Executive Officer in Toronto, ON
pros:
- important work
- chance to grow

cons: - NFP - definitely not a large corporate

pros: Important work. Great colleagues. Eager membership base willing to engage.

review_title: Amazing culture, inspiring leadership, work that matters.
pros: Wonderful organization and vibrant culture, that is fast paced and doing ground breaking work in research, programming and recruiting that supports gender equality. Smart and agile group with efficiency at the key.  Amazing  and inspirational leadership.
cons: Work is fast paced, but this is a culture where everyone helps one another, true collaboration and motivation for everyone to succeed.

review_title: Best career move I have ever made
pros: I learned more in one year here than I did in my entire career in finance.  You get to interact with every financial shop on Bay Street and do work that matters.
cons: no profits = no bonus (but worth the career investment!). Non-financial benefits can  compensate.
